sentences: ennegu Mardist poisiga teenisime all külas üleaedseid, ennegu isa suri.
Veel kahest kõrtsist möödus ta, ennegu jõudis Amme jõeni.
context: The word 'poisiga' appears in the context of the phrase 'ennegu Mardist poisiga', which is a variation of 'ennegu' meaning 'before'. The dictionary shows it used with examples that indicate temporal sequence - something happening before another event. This seems to be an archaic or dialectal form, possibly related to the word 'poiss' (boy) but functioning as part of a temporal conjunction phrase.
